@BelfastPotter-you could always use uTorr and change the priority of a file to 'skip' to prevent uTorr from attempting to dl it, then just put the priority back to normal onl a specific file whenever you want to dl it, so you could in essence dl the files individually if you wanted, provided the initial seeder is on or other peers have the pieces you are trying to get
